AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.description: I'm a 21-year-old Software Engineering student since early 2024. My passion for technology and programming started early, at age 12, when I took a robotics course. Since then, I've been dedicated to learning and improving my skills in the field, exploring various aspects of software development.

bewear-ecommerce.description: A modern, fully featured e-commerce platform for fashion products, built with the latest web technologies.

http-client.description: A powerful HTTP client for making API requests, written in Rust to maximize performance and reliability.

portfolio-website.description: My personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.

Card.title: Get in Touch
Card.description: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, opportunities, or just a friendly hello!
